snippet: In an uncharacteristically stern warning, the United Nations ordered individuals near the eastern city of Goma to turn in their weapons or be deemed “an imminent threat to civilians.”
abstract: United Nations, in early test of robust new mandate for the multinational peacekeeping contingent, threatens to forcibly disarm rebels in the Democratic Republic of Congo; orders individuals near the eastern city of Goma to turn in their weapons or be deemed 'an imminent threat to civilians.'
lead_paragraph: In an uncharacteristically stern warning, the United Nations ordered individuals near the eastern city of Goma to turn in their weapons or be deemed “an imminent threat to civilians.”

headline.main: U.N. Warns It Will Disarm Congo Rebels
headline.print_headline: U.N. Warns It Will Disarm Congo Rebels
